channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 濒临破产的 Signa 企业集团创始人雷内-本科向奥地利法院申请个人破产，该法院正在审查他的个人财务状况
item.description:
Rene Benko, the founder of the ailing Signa conglomerate, files for personal insolvency at an Austrian court that was reviewing his personal finances https://t.co/1Aot4qoaNL

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 硅谷银行倒闭一年后，美国的贷款人仍在为收拾烂摊子付出代价--而且很可能会变得更糟，约为 41 亿美元
item.description:
A year after Silicon Valley Bank’s collapse, US lenders are still paying the price for cleaning up the mess — and it’s likely to get about $4.1 billion worse https://t.co/oUJckBV6vs

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 经过多年对收购可能性的猜测，Cboe 全球市场公司新任首席执行官表示，收购方不太可能提出可行的收购要约。
item.description:
After years of speculation about takeover possibilities, the new CEO of Cboe Global Markets says it’s unlikely a suitor will make an offer that works https://t.co/5TzsLFspym

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: "工党议员雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）在回应杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）的预算案时说："他们经历了五位首相、七位大臣和 12 个不同的增长计划。
item.description:
"They've had five prime ministers, seven chancellors, 12 different growth plans"

The UK government's attempts to boost the country's economy are "frankly not working," says Labour's Rachel Reeves as she responds to Jeremy Hunt's budget https://t.co/NMej5zFUHf pic.twitter.com/iMzPGioc1V

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 埃及在短短 10 天内从经济灾难的边缘走到了从阿联酋和国际货币基金组织获得 400 多亿美元资金的道路上--沙特可能是下一个投资对象
item.description:
In barely 10 days, Egypt has gone from the brink of economic disaster to unlocking more than $40 billion from the UAE and IMF — and Saudi investment could be next https://t.co/YxQwqKe0na

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 世界上最大的船员工会之一表示，在胡塞武装发动致命袭击后，任何仍在红海航行的船只都应紧急重新考虑航程。
item.description:
One of the world’s biggest unions for ship-crew members says any vessels still sailing through the Red Sea should urgently reconsider the voyages following a deadly Houthi attack https://t.co/k9RCiPB3Iw

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 多伦多证券交易所已有一年未进行首次公开募股，这一历史性的干旱引发了人们对加拿大股票市场健康状况的担忧。
item.description:
The Toronto Stock Exchange hasn't had an IPO in a year, and the historic drought is raising concerns about the health of Canada’s equity markets https://t.co/qcJDsaY3j5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 墨西哥的总体通胀率自 10 月份以来首次放缓，这增加了人们对央行将在本月晚些时候启动降息周期的押注
item.description:
Mexico’s headline inflation slowed for the first time since October, increasing bets that central bankers will start a cycle of interest rate cuts later this month https://t.co/0WBRBovgOW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 如果你看《拜登》在线观看(ὌωὌ)的数据，拜登在总统任期内悄然取得了不错的成绩。问题是：这对特朗普来说重要吗？@kylascan 在 #SOTU2024 前解释道
item.description:
If you look at the 📊 data, 📊 Biden is quietly having a good presidency. The question is: Will that matter against Trump?

🎥 @kylascan explains ahead of #SOTU2024 https://t.co/23OZ6AzOB6 pic.twitter.com/UXWM6My8LK

— Bloomberg Opinion (@opinion) March 7, 2024

item.title: 在吉达举行的彭博社 #PowerPlayers 峰会上。@McLarenF1 的首席执行官 @ZBrown 谈到了 @F1 的扩张和增加亚洲赛事数量的问题。
item.description:
At the Bloomberg #PowerPlayers Summit in Jeddah. CEO of @McLarenF1, @ZBrownCEO spoke about the expansion of @F1 and increasing the number of races across Asia. pic.twitter.com/XSy1388KEy

— Bloomberg Live (@BloombergLive) March 7, 2024

item.title: 干旱天气威胁最大供应国巴西的甘蔗作物
item.description:
Dry Weather Threatens Sugar Cane Crops in Top Supplier Brazil https://t.co/6SPPwntRDV

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 镍王印尼的大量供应压制了全球价格，但这种电池金属可能即将反弹
item.description:
Nickel king Indonesia has suppressed global prices with its massive supply, but a rally in the battery metal might be in the offing https://t.co/XrGtgi9R4C

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 英国预算监督机构称，脱欧对经济的打击正如其所预期的那样正在显现，并维持了英国脱欧支持者批评其过于悲观的展望。
item.description:
Britain’s budget watchdog said a hit to the economy from leaving the European Union is unfolding as it expected, maintaining an outlook that Brexit supporters have criticized as overly pessimistic https://t.co/amppzUYbBv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: Cigna 与肥胖症药物制造商礼来和诺和诺德达成协议，旨在通过限制雇主资助的医疗计划必须为药物支付的费用来扩大覆盖范围
item.description:
Cigna strikes deals with obesity drug makers Eli Lilly and Novo Nordisk that aim to widen coverage by limiting how much employer-sponsored health plans have to pay for the medicines https://t.co/pwrgsDmsoQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 拜登对亿万富翁：彭博公开赛，美洲版
item.description:
Biden v. Billionaires: The Bloomberg Open, Americas Edition https://t.co/lFaMC5TBjR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 安联首席经济学家 Ludovic Subran 表示，如果欧洲央行最终降息而美联储不采取同样行动，那么欧洲央行今年将陷入困境。
item.description:
The ECB will find itself in a pickle this year if it ends up cutting interest rates without the Fed doing likewise, Allianz Chief Economist Ludovic Subran says https://t.co/YC09wxfaZi

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 半导体股票期权交易呈爆炸式增长，因为投资者押注于时下股票市场最热门的事物：人工智能
item.description:
Options trading in semiconductor stocks is exploding as investors bet on the hottest thing in equity markets these days: artificial intelligence https://t.co/75EbsMWtbW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: Pantera 正在向大型投资者寻求数百万美元，以购买 FTX 破产财产中大幅折价的 Solana 代币
item.description:
Pantera is seeking millions of dollars from large investors to buy deeply discounted Solana tokens from the FTX bankruptcy estate https://t.co/Ll8dKENnFP

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 尼日利亚推出旨在重振石油和天然气行业投资的新措施
item.description:
Nigeria introduced new measures aimed at revamping investment in its oil and natural gas sector https://t.co/WkoYmYNkTB

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔再次向立法者发表讲话，乔-拜登总统发表国情咨文，欧洲央行决定利率。以下是市场动向。
item.description:
Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell speaks to lawmakers again, President Joe Biden delivers his State of the Union address and the European Central Bank decides on interest rates. Here’s what’s moving markets. https://t.co/rzoAMJmtFs

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 塞尔维亚连续第八个月维持基准利率不变
item.description:
Serbia holds its benchmark interest rate unchanged for an eighth month https://t.co/n2bx5DZ7QF

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 在以色列-哈马斯战争引发地区混乱之际，地区大国正努力为埃及带来稳定
item.description:
Regional powers are working to bring stability to Egypt at a time of regional chaos sparked by the Israel-Hamas war https://t.co/OCsVnSYiWf

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 英国企业预计在未来 12 个月内将面临超过 5%的顽固高工资增长，英格兰银行认为这一水平是不可持续的
item.description:
UK businesses are expecting to face stubbornly high wage growth of over 5% over the next 12 months, a level seen as unsustainable by the Bank of England https://t.co/ChHrGZZRrd

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 拜登将在国情咨文中提议将美国大型企业和跨国公司的最低税率提高至 21
item.description:
Biden will propose increasing the minimum tax rates paid by major US and multinational corporations to 21% in his State of the Union address https://t.co/t7EmaJ3Uhg

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 梅尔罗斯工业公司称航空航天市场的供应链问题阻碍了增长
item.description:
Melrose Industries says supply-chain issues in the aerospace market are holding back growth https://t.co/MhlMuoT3Ot

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 塞内加尔当局宣布将在 3 月底前举行推迟的选举后，塞内加尔美元债券上涨
item.description:
Senegal’s dollar bonds advance after authorities announce that delayed elections will take place by the end of March https://t.co/K5fi52FU8Z

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，拜登的最高经济顾问莱尔-布雷纳德（Lael Brainard）成功地推动改变了白宫的预测，从而使总统的预算计划前景更加乐观。
item.description:
Lael Brainard, Biden's top economic adviser, successfully pushed to change a White House forecast in a way that resulted in a rosier outlook for the president's budget plan, sources say https://t.co/SgyWx3MlMD

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: "每年 1,800 亿美元，比音乐和电影的总和还要大"。ESL FACEIT Group (EFG) 联席首席执行官 Craig Levine 谈电竞和游戏产业的投资和机遇。
item.description:
"$180 bn annually which is bigger than music and movies combined." Craig Levine, Co-CEO, ESL FACEIT Group (EFG) on investment and opportunities in Esports and the gaming industry. pic.twitter.com/oQx9crXvAY

— Bloomberg Live (@BloombergLive) March 7, 2024

item.title: 谷歌逃离中国多年后，微软的中国业务依然强劲，但成功意味着要维护北京的防火墙
item.description:
Microsoft’s China business is going strong years after Google fled, but success has meant maintaining Beijing’s great firewall https://t.co/DPPpbEI8U0

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: Adnoc 正在推进一个新的液化天然气出口项目计划，成为希望在本十年晚些时候不断增长的市场中分一杯羹的最新公司
item.description:
Adnoc is advancing plans for a new liquefied natural gas export project, making it the latest company looking to capture a share of the growing market later this decade https://t.co/qmooEmBa40

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024
